dmca.title: [ABUSE] URGENT! Seconf Request! RE: DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Kimberlyhollan
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of The Planet Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Monday, June 05, 2006 11:32 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT! Seconf Request! RE: DMCA Copyright
Infringement Notice Kimberlyholland.org (70.86.49.75)]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT! Seconf Request! RE: DMCA Copyright
Infringement Notice Kimberlyholland.org (70.86.49.75)]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at
the address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] URGENT! Seconf Request! RE: DMCA Copyright
Infringement Notice Kimberlyholland.org (70.86.49.75)
Date:         Mon, 5 Jun 2006 11:13:15 -0500
From:         Cherkashina, Tatyana <TCherkashina@playboy.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



Dear Sirs,



I would like to follow-up on my request below and bring to your
attention that the link http://www.kimberlyholland.org/ is active and
still displays infringed material.



Best regards,



Tatyana Cherkashina
Intellectual Property Assistant


*Playboy Enterprises International, Inc.* 680 N. Lake Shore Drive
Chicago, IL 60611 312.751.8000 tcherkashina@playboy.com





-
------------------------------------------------------------------------

*From:* abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] *On
Behalf Of *Policy Enforcement
*Sent:* Friday, June 02, 2006 6:54 AM
*To:* Cherkashina, Tatyana
*Cc:* Ball, Mary
*Subject:* Re: [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice
Kimberlyholland.org (70.86.49.75)



copyright@theplanet.com is the clearinghouse for all copyright
infringement reports. Your email is being sent to our legal counsel at
the address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration. You may find
their direct contact information at this URL:

http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Cherkashina, Tatyana wrote:
> June 1, 2006
>
> * *
>
> *ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. *
>
> *1333 North Stemmons Freeway*
>
> *Suite** 110***
>
> *Dallas**, TX 75207***
>
> *US*
>
> * *
>
> *abuse@theplanet.com***
>
> * *
>
> Dear Sir or Madam:
>
> It has been brought to our attention that web pages at 
> *Kimberlyholland.org (70.86.49.75) *display, without authorization, 
> reproductions of images owned by Playboy Enterprises International,
Inc.
> (?Playboy?). All right, title and interest in and to these images 
> belongs to Playboy.
>
> I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on 
> *Kimberlyholland.org (70.86.49.75)* are not authorized by the 
> copyright owner, its agent or the law.
>
> Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy 
> copyrighted images on *Kimberlyholland.org (70.86.49.75) *and on all 
> web pages under your control.
>
> Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following
links:
>
> http://www.kimberlyholland.org/
>
> 
>
> I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act

> on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the 
> above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted 
> images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises 
> International, Inc., 680 N. Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611,

> Fax 312-266-2042, phone 312-751-8000, E-mail address is 
> tcherkashina@playboy.com.
>
> We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter
immediately.
>
> This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any 
> rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or 
> otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly 
> reserved.
>
>
>
> PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC.
>
> Tatyana Cherkashina
>
> Intellectual Property Assistant
>
> cc: Ana Cashman, Esq.
>
> 
>
> 
>
> 
>
> Tatyana Cherkashina
>
> Intellectual Property Assistant
>
> 
>
> Playboy Enterprises International, Inc.
>
> 680 N. Lake Shore Drive
>
> Chicago, IL 60611
>
> 312.751.8000
>
> ---
> This email message is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) 
> and may contain confidential and privileged information.  Any 
> unauthorized review, use, disclosure or distribution is prohibited.  
> If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by 
> reply email and destroy all copies of the original message.  If you 
> are the intended recipient, please be advised that the content of this

> message is subject to access, review and disclosure by the sender's 
> Email System Administrator.////
>
> // //
>
> * *
>
> 
>


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
